Requirement summary (verify against offi: Safety and performance: devices achieve intended performance and are safe; benefit-risk acceptable.
Design / Risk controls (summary): Claim set A; quality gating; risk management; conservative labeling.
Verification & Validation evidence (doc: RMF (ISO 14971) + Acceptance criteria + V&V plan/evidence matrix + Release/Update policy + Quality gating
